summaries.summary: Shipped 8 warranty validation fixes in OrderProtection/monolog (TypeScript) with 21 commits. Updated pidoshva.github.io portfolio with automated weekly summaries. Advanced cart-widget customization features.
highlights: monolog (OrderProtection): Fixed warranty display logic, validation, and ID handling across 8 merged PRs
monolog (OrderProtection): Resolved warranty duration type handling and premium/pricing rule integration
monolog (OrderProtection): Added dependsOn to test targets and fixed mobile layout issues
pidoshva.github.io: Updated portfolio with weekly summary automation and GitHub email configuration
pidoshva.github.io: Added blog post and refined journal workflow with 20 commits
cart-widget (OrderProtection): Reviewed customizable info modal PR and merged fluid/API widget feature
geleus-io: Updated resume with OrderProtection role and refreshed skills section
monolog (OrderProtection): Open PR for Monaco editor integration in customizer advanced config

prs.title: refactor: tagging to allow extended warranties
fix: ensure no warranties are displayed under Warranties if its off
fix: warranty id defaulting to null
fix: determine warranty validity from extended premium and pricing rules
fix: add validity field to WarrantyDto
fix: DTO validation for extended warranties
refactor(customizer): use Monaco editor in advanced config
fix(merchant-svc): wire up LaunchDarkly for extended warranty featur
feat(api/fluid): add fluid and API widget.
fix: make sure hbs is available
